casebody.data:
No. 09-841. Houston Independent School District, Petitioner v. V. P., By Next Friends Juan P., et ux. 559 U.S. 1007, 130 S. Ct. 1892,

176 L. Ed. 2d 365,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2578. March 22, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 582 F.3d 576.
